title: Google Duo
description: Google Duo, an innovative video calling app from Google, adorns a vibrant and energetic color palette. The brand prominently features the colors Yellow (#FFC801), Blue (#4A8AF4), and Black (#000000). These colors encapsulate the lively and dynamic nature of the app, aiming to offer users a seamless and engaging communication experience. Information regarding the brand's color scheme and overall design is derived from their Behance project page, a testimony to its creative inspirations and design accomplishments.
